name: R20 Moe Bomberman
summary: R20 ☆ Moe Bomberman is a video game released on mobile devices, exclusively in Japan. It is a cross-over between Hudson Soft's R20 ☆ Moe series and the Bomberman series.

name: R2-D2 Tamagotchi
summary: The R2-D2 Tamagotchi is a licensed Tamagotchi Nano model based on the Star Wars character R2-D2.

name: R2R: Rewire to Revolt
summary: A teenage hacker with the unique Flipper Zero device stands against a bloody AI dictatorship in a post-apocalyptic Eastern Europe, where a cyber-technology war rages for human consciousness. Use hacking, parkour, and stealth, to stop this genocide.

name: R2Beat
summary: Rhythm Racing Beat, R2BEAT! The running Rhythm game is back! Enjoy a rhythm game full of speed! R2BEAT is a game that combines sound games and race games in which characters wearing inline skates run through various courses while avoiding obstacles to the rhythm.

name: R2D Tank
summary: A maze gamer where the player controls a tank and battles enemy tanks.

name: R2 Online: Reign of Revolution
summary: R2 Online is a MMORPG game with a focus on player-vs-player combat. The game takes place in the fantasy world, torn apart by endless conflicts between mercenary guilds. Choose your side in this confrontation or challenge the whole world by creating a new guild. Hone your skills by slaying monsters and completing quests in between fierce battles.

name: R2D Tank
summary: R2D Tank is simple 2D arcade game and a sequel to Red Tank. The player controls a tank, collects dots for points and fights against enemy tanks. When an enemy tank is destroyed, a next vehicle appears on the battlefield. Mines (red dots) lie on battlefield and these can be destroyed by shooting them. Later levels have more enemies.
